dcterms:creator: A. Lazar
G. Pipa
J. Triesch
dcterms:description: A self-organizing recurrent neural network model that demonstrates the synergy of multiple plasticity mechanisms to account for various features observed in cortical microcircuits.
dcterms:title: SORN (Self-Organizing Recurrent Network)

dcterms:creator: Z. Tosi
J. Yoshimi
dcterms:description: A flexible, visually-oriented neural network simulator that provides basic neural network functions and allows for custom source code for more complex features.
dcterms:title: Simbrain

dcterms:creator: J. L. Elman
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of grammatical structure tokens used to investigate the capabilities of simple recurrent networks in learning and processing language structures.
dcterms:title: Grammatical Structure Tokens

dcterms:creator: L. Yassin
B. L. Benedetti
J. S. Jouhanneau
J. A. Wen
J. F. Poulet
A. L. Barth
dcterms:description: A dataset examining the properties of c-fos expressing neurons, highlighting the connectivity and activity patterns of highly active neurons in the neocortex.
dcterms:title: c-fos expressing neurons

dcterms:creator: B. L. Benedetti
Y. Takashima
J. A. Wen
J. Urban-Ciecko
A. L. Barth
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on the synaptic properties of high firing rate neurons, detailing the wiring differences that drive sparse and reliable firing during neocortical development.
dcterms:title: Synaptic properties of high firing rate neurons

dcterms:creator: R. Perin
T. K. Berger
H. Markram
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the synaptic organizing principles for cortical neuronal groups, providing insights into the connectivity patterns within the cortex.
dcterms:title: Connectivity studies by Perin et al.

dcterms:creator: S. Song
P. J. Sjöström
M. Reigl
S. Nelson
D. B. Chklovskii
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the highly nonrandom features of synaptic connectivity in local cortical circuits, contributing to the understanding of synaptic efficacy.
dcterms:title: Studies on synaptic efficacy

dcterms:creator: S. Nigam
M. Shimono
S. Ito
F. C. Yeh
N. Timme
M. Myroshynchenko
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates the rich-club organization in effective connectivity among cortical neurons, providing insights into the structural properties of neural networks.
dcterms:title: Studies on rich-club organization
